comment: Avoid this place at all cost
price is reasonable, doctors are experienced, and nice.
I bought the puppy wellness plan from Banfield.  It covers everything a puppy needs in his first year.  The service is great and neutering procedure is very smooth and my puppy recovered very fast.

hospital: VCA Vets & Pets on El Camino
comment: Their fees are twice or three times of other clinics. The doctor was either inexperienced or tried to charge for unnecessary checks, she Made it sound really bad and recommended sedation and X-ray which would cost almost $700 for an infection that antibiotics cured in a week.Ê
